title: Machu Picchu
description: The Lost City of the Incas, Machu Picchu is Peru's most iconic destination and one of the New Seven Wonders of the World. This remarkably preserved Inca citadel sits dramatically on a mountain ridge above the Sacred Valley.

practical_info.getting_there: Train from Cusco/Ollantaytambo to Aguas Calientes, then bus to entrance
practical_info.tickets: Must be booked in advance, especially for Huayna Picchu
practical_info.best_photos: Early morning for sunrise, fewer crowds
